In addition, a number of vessels shown under ore, phosphates, lead, &o., under(4) on page 4 load outward for an Allied Government. A comparison of the numbers shown under I. and IV. for the 8 months does not therefore give an accurate criterion of the vessels in Allied service at the different periods. *f "Eequisition " is here used to mean "requisition for full Government service." tt Includes 8 vessels (28,134 6.T.) transferred from Norwegian flag under the Norwegian Agreement.
